WorkItem.Description:
Currently their is only a getRowIterator() which returns a new instance of a row iterator each time. For the sake of simplicity it would be nice if a sheet had a static instance of a row iterator that way it is easier to contiguously display data on the page without having to keep track of the your current row iterator.
 
I would additionally like to see a setPosition method in the PHPExcel_Worksheet_RowIterator class.
 
This could be implemented easily by a higher layer, but to me would make sense to put into the core component.
 
I'll attach a patch when I get some stuff cleaned up.
WorkItem.Summary: Row instance iterator, and position access
